title: SA1505 An opening brace should not be followed by a blank line

commit.message: SA1505 An opening brace should not be followed by a blank line

nodes.body: Looks like there are more instances of this one, notably in ArraySortHelper.

> Looks like there are more instances of this one, notably in ArraySortHelper.

This is another issue of code being pulled in from a nuget package for which we don't have any control. Its being worked on in https://github.com/dotnet/roslyn/issues/55992. 

Either way, I should probably go submit PRs to fix all those instances of issues in Roslyn.
